alert.note: Alert for Elbert; Madison; Oglethorpe (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 9:52PM EST until January 11 at 4:31PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Broad River near Broad River above Carlton affecting Elbert, Oglethorpe and Madison Counties. For the Broad River...including Broad River above Carlton, Commerce...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Broad River near Broad River above Carlton. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 18 feet, Minor flooding will expand further into the woodlands and fields along the river upstream and downstream from the gage on the Georgia Highway 72 bridge. A sand dredge operation on the left bank near the gage will become flooded. A large portion of Roy Wood Road will be flooded with several feet of water and the Broad River Outpost for Canoes and Kayaks location will be under water. Flooding of the yard behind an assisted living home off of Roy Wood Road will continue to expand. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 17.8 feet and falling. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning and continue falling to 6 feet Monday evening. - Flood stage is 15 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 1000 AM EST.
